description: The course will lead the students to read English literature for children and to help the students to improve the reading skill and to understand the western culture. In class, by discussing the contexts of the literary works, students can interpret the literary works from different perspectives

syllabus.zh:
1.Explore literary works for children
2.Understand literary theories
3.Understand the background of literary works
4.Enhance aesthetic development through reading literary works
